GSD.description:
NFSD: Protect against send buffer overflow in NFSv3 READ

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 309f29361b6bfae96936317376f1114568c5de19. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFSD: Protect against send buffer overflow in NFSv3 READ
